cookies.analytics_storage: Enables storage (such as cookies) related to analytics e.g. visit duration.
cookies.ad_storage: Enables storage (such as cookies) related to advertising.
cookies.ad_user_data: Sets consent for sending user data related to advertising to Google.
cookies.functionality_storage: Enables storage that supports the functionality of the website or app e.g. language settings.
cookies.personalization_storage: Enables storage related to personalization e.g. video recommendations.
cookies.security_storage: Enables storage related to security such as authentication functionality, fraud prevention, and other user protection.
